name: ep_user_pad
description: With the user_pad plugin it's possible to create password saved pads in groups. It's a User-Management System. It allows User to register, authenticate, to create groups and to create pads in groups
readme:
INSTALL
=======

npm install ep_pad_tracker
(see also https://github.com/Pita/etherpad-lite/wiki/Creating-a-plugin   [Step 5 Install plugin])
